ItemSpecial: SaveA warrior who is wearing light armour has a basic D6 saving throw of 6.

SaveA warrior that is wearing heavy armour has a basic D6 saving throw of 5+.
MovementA warrior that is armed with both heavy armour and a shield suffers a -1 Movement penalty.
SaveA model with a shield has a basic save of 6 on a D6.

ParryA model equipped with a buckler may parry the first blow in each round of hand-to-hand combat. When his opponent scores a hit, a model with a buckler may roll 1D6. If the score is greater than the highest to hit score of his opponent, the model has parried the blow, and that attack is discarded. A model may not parry attacks made with double or more its own Strength - they are simply too powerful to be stopped.

Avoid stunA model that is equipped with a Helmet has a special 4+ save on a D6 against being stunned. If the save is made, treat the stunned result as knocked down instead. This save is not modified by the opponent Strength.

SaveIthilmar Armour gives the wearer a 5+ basic save.
LightIthilmar Armour does not slow the wearer down if he is also armed with a shield.

SaveGromril Armour gives the wearer 4+ basic save.
LightGromril Armour does not slow the wearer down if he is also armed with a shield.

SaveArmour of the Wildwood provides a 6+ saving throw
WildwoodThe Hero receives +1 Toughness and +1 Movement.

SaveA model with a Banded Belly Plate has a basic save of 6 on a D6.
Belly SaveOnce per battle when the Hero suffers a critical hit you may reduce it to a normal wound by catching it on the belly plate.

SaveA model mounted on barded mount receives an additional +1 Armour Save.
Animal ProtectionA mount wearing barding will only be killed on a D6 roll of a 1 if the model is taken out of action.
SaveA model with a Beast Hide has a save of 6 on a D6 that cannot be modified by Strength of the attacker.
SaveA model with a Wyvern Hide Cloak has a save of 6 on a D6 that cannot be modified by Strength of the attacker.

SaveThe Blessed Hauberk can be worn instead of light armour for a saving throw of 6+.
BlessedThe blessing conveys +1 Movement, +1 Toughness and +1 Wound.
Blessed HideA model with the Blessed Stag Hide can re-roll a failed Initiative thest once per turn.

SaveA model with the Chaos Armour has a basic save of 4+ on a D6.
RarityWhen searching for Chaos Armour a warrior gains +1 on his roll for each model the took out of action in the previous battle.
CostThe cost for found Chaos Armour is decreased by 1 gold crown for each Experience point the Hero has.
ItemRestriction: Marauders of Chaos, Norse, Beastmen, Chaos Dwarfs, Cults of Chaos

ItemSpecial:
SaveAny model waring Enchanged Skins receives a 6+ special save versus any inflicted wounds.
Magic protectionThe wearer of Enchanted Skins is unaffected by enemy magic on a roll of 5+.

Avoid stunA model that is equipped with a Cooking Pot has a special 4+ save on a D6 against being stunned. If the save is made, treat the stunned result as knocked down instead. This save is not modified by the opponent Strength.

SaveA warrior that is wearing a Lamellar Armour has a basic D6 saving throw of 4+.
MovementA warrior that is armed with both a Lamellar Armour and a shield suffers a -1 Movement penalty.

SaveA model with the Oaken Armour has a basic save of 5+ on a D6.
Antient OakThe Hero receives +1 Toughness.
Enchaned WoodEnemy models receive -1 to hit the wearer in close combat.

SaveIn close combat a model with a Pavise has a basic save of 6 on a D6 (treat it as shield), but only if the warrior was charged to his front.
Mobile CoverA warrior using a Pavice counts as if he is in cover against missile attacks (-1 to hit).
CumbersomeBecause the Pavise is so heavy and cumbersome, the bearer moves at half pace.
Scales Save5+ armour save in close combat and 4+ armour save against missiles.
Noggin protectionA model with a Skull Cap receives a +1 Toughness.

SaveThis can be worn under normal armour to add a further +1 to armour save or can be worn on its own giving the wearer a 6+ save.
FlammableThe item is destroyed if the Hero wearing it is ever set on fire.

SaveToughened Leathers work exactly like light armour, giving the wearer a 6+ Armour Save.
Only armourToughened Leathers cannot be combined with the effects of any other armour except a helmet or buckler.
UndesirableToughened leathers cannot be sold back at the Trading Post.

SaveA model wearing Wolf Cloakwill gain +1 to his Armour Saves against all shooting attacks.
Special acquisitionTo acquire Wolf Cloak a Hero must pay 10gc (to represent the expence of travelling to Middenheim and taking part in a hunt). In addition, the Hero must roll equal to or under his Strength on a D6. If successful, the Hero finds and slayes the wolf and can wear its cloak as a mark of his skill and prowess.

SaveA model wearing Norse Furs will gain +1 to his Armour Saves against all shooting attacks.
Special acquisitionTo acquire Norse Furs a Hero must pay 10gc (to represent the expence of travelling to Norsca and taking part in a hunt). In addition, the Hero must roll equal to or under his Strength on a D6. If successful, the Hero finds and slayes the wolf and can wear its cloak as a mark of his skill and prowess.
